body.name: Charlie's Soap Booster & Hard Water Treatment 160 Loads (2.64 Lbs, 1 Pack) Natural Powdered Water Softener and Laundry Booster – Safe and Effective

soldBy.name: Charlie's Soap DIV Sutherland Products, Inc

body.merchantInfo: Charlie's Soap DIV Sutherland Products, Inc
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 59 mins
features: Economical - Environmentally safe phosphate designed to soften water and leave no hard water scale, and at 160 average loads per bag, that is 0.17 cents per load and cheaper than the competition.
Boosts cleaning power of laundry detergent: Our laundry softener aids in the removal of tough stains and dirt from clothes and works to boost the cleaning power of your laundry detergent

Effective odor and stain removal: Booster formulated to aid in the removal of problem minerals from your water such as calcium, helping rid odors and stains from clothes, leaving them fresh and clean.
Safe for the environment: Add to your laundry supplies for a water treatment and laundry booster that and is an eco-friendly product for home use, making it safe for the environment
Septic Safe - When used in moderation, formula is safe in septic and municipal water systems. Non-precipitating and will not form scale
body.description: Some wander this Earth seeking wisdom. A lot of folks Charlie talks with are looking to beat hard water. Our Booster is a hard-water treatment made from a non-toxic biodegradable phosphate that brings out the best of Charlie’s Soap without leaving any residues on your clothes. It controls minerals in your wash water with just 1/2 tablespoon per load. Your septic system and washing machine will be safe, too, because Booster is completely soluble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Charlie's Soap Booster & Hard Water Treatment has been a game-changer in my laundry routine. As someone who deals with hard water issues, this product has proven to be a lifesaver in keeping my clothes clean and vibrant.One of the standout features of this booster is its effectiveness in tackling the challenges posed by hard water. Hard water can leave mineral deposits on fabrics, making them appear dull and worn over time. With Charlie's Soap Booster, I've seen a remarkable improvement in the brightness and cleanliness of my clothes. The booster effectively prevents mineral buildup and restores the vibrancy of fabrics, making my laundry look as good as new.The versatility of this product is another major advantage. I can easily incorporate it into my existing laundry routine, whether I'm using it with Charlie's Soap Laundry Powder or another detergent. This flexibility ensures that I can enjoy the benefits of the booster regardless of the detergent I prefer.The fact that the booster is biodegradable and eco-friendly aligns perfectly with my values. I appreciate that I can achieve exceptional laundry results without compromising on environmental responsibility. The formula is free from harsh chemicals, making it safe for my family and the planet.Moreover, the impact of Charlie's Soap Booster on fabric quality is remarkable. Even after multiple washes, my clothes retain their softness and texture, which is a testament to the gentle yet effective nature of the product.While the effectiveness of the booster is undeniable, the packaging could be improved for easier pouring. However, this minor inconvenience doesn't overshadow the benefits it provides.In conclusion, Charlie's Soap Booster & Hard Water Treatment is a must-have for anyone dealing with hard water issues or looking to enhance their laundry results. Its ability to combat mineral buildup, versatility, eco-friendly formula, and positive impact on fabric quality make it an exceptional product. If you're seeking a solution to hard water challenges, I highly recommend giving this booster a try – you won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant, cause we have horrible hard water in Boerne Texas, I tried Charlie's Hard Water powder, 1 scoop per load, and my clothes are brighter, softer, and no longer dingy. I also feel like it intensifies my Laundry Sauce - Egyptian Rose, I love this treatment and I will be ordering the bulk size next.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these products, works well and no smells, naturally fresh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We have hard water, this helps a lot!
reviews.reviewText: This powder seems to work well. Throw it into the drum with your laundry soap and such and it seems to do the job. We live in Florida and the water is hard down here so help your water do a better job with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Helps natural detergents work better.
reviews.reviewText: No scent at all. We use at half strength due to the water in our area being softer. The down side is its expensive but lasts a long time. Helps natural detergents/soap based products clean better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really softens our very hard well water
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product for use in a washing machine if you have hard water. It assists by helping the detergent perform better. I’ve used it for quite some time and do not want to live without it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have used the same product to soften the water in my laundry for years, for some odd reason it is the only one on the market and has been for years. I purchased Charlies not expecting much, boy was I surprised! Just a small scoop and the washer water was soft to the touch. It not only softens the water it but enhances the clean smell and seems to work with my detergent to produce cleaner clothes. I will continue to buy this product from here on out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fresh and clean
reviews.reviewText: I really like how bright my white clothes look after using this product
This has really lessened the white soap residue on dark clothes washed in hard water. It was recommended by a staff at local dry cleaner. So glad I found this product.
I bought this because I couldn’t get Calgon. It also works to soften your water. We use it in our RV holding tanks. It works also.Abe

I move to an area with very hard water. Laundry soap on it's own would not get my clothes clean. The first load I tried with Charlie's Soap Laundry Booster was amazing. The clothes came out clean and had a nice fresh scent.
Love it! Leaves my laundry smelling great . Brightens and soften. Great product, a little does the job.
Like because the soap gives a boost of whiteness to my white load.
